description: From Middle English curiusly, curyously, curiosly, curiouseliche, curyouslyche, equivalent to curious +â€Ž -ly.

adverbs.description: curiously (comparative more curiously, superlative most curiously)

entries.meaning: In a curious manner; with curiosity; inquisitively.
examples: The children peeped curiously into the attic room.

entries.meaning: Oddly; in a strange or unexpected way.
examples: Curiously, when I arrived home, the front door was standing ajar.
